warning_keep_tab_open.message: Keep the Instagram tab open until the process is complete.

warning_no_interaction.message: Do not interact with the Instagram tab while the process is running.

warning_time_depends.message: The duration depends on how many followers/following you have.

warning_other_tabs_ok.message: You can use other Chrome tabs normally.

warning_how_it_works.message: The extension scrolls your follower/following lists to collect data.

err_no_ig_tab.message: No Instagram tab found. Open instagram.com and try again.
